snippet: An unusual accounting method helps the parent of Jared, Kay and Zales make its loan portfolio look shinier than it should....

headline.main: Signet Jewelers’ Balance Sheet Gets Extra Sparkle
headline.print_headline: Signet’s Balance Sheet Gets Extra Sparkle

lead_paragraph: An unusual accounting method helps the parent of Jared, Kay and Zales make its loan portfolio look shinier than it should.
